Description: A string of large thin shell disc beads and four small green glazed composition discs.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75, describes C-Group jewellery from this cemetery without specific mention of this burial.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (367)
